item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installation Flask can be installed with pip using the following command: $ pip3 install flask It is preferred to have a virtual environment enabled for all Python projects. Refer to this article on how to setup Virtual environments. Simple Web Application Let's write a simple web application with index route. Write the above code in a file called, app.py. Execute the above code using the following command:
